item.description:
A Christmas Carol
Adapted by Keith Weirich.

Based on the Charles Dickens classic, A CHRISTMAS CAROL tells the tale of curmudgeonly miser Ebenezer Scrooge, who is visited by the ghosts of Christmases Past, Present and Future hoping to change his destiny and save his soul. This play with music is an original adaptation by Peacock Players Artistic Director Keith Weirich, follows Scrooge through a strange and magical journey, where he ultimately discovers the true spirit of the holiday season.

Tickets at
Peacock Players
Peacock Players 4 Court St. Nashua NH, 03060 | Box Office: (603) 886-7000
$17 Adult
$15 Senior Purchase your own ticket on line. Looking at center section Row B or C Left hand side.

Pre-show Dinner at Villa Banca at 5 pm. 194 Main Street Nashua, NH 03060 Villa Banca website
